com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.services.aspera.transfer

Class AsperaTransferManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.services.aspera.transfer.AsperaTransferManager

  • public class AsperaTransferManager
extends Object
    Aspera transfer Manager class to handle multiple functions to the Aspera service using the Aspera SDK as the underlying library to handle the transfer. This Class also instantiates the token provider AsperaDelegateTokenProvider to retrieve a delegate token for the Aspera Service

    • Field Summary

      • getFaspConnectionInfo

        public FASPConnectionInfo getFaspConnectionInfo(String bucketName)
        Check the LRU cache to see if the Aspera Key has already been retrieved for this bucket. If it has, return it, else call onto the s3Client to get the FASPConnectionInfo for the bucket name
        Parameters:
